com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.risk

Class RiskParams<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thalesgroup.gemalto.d1.risk.RiskParams<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The targeted object to do risk assessment. Following types are supported:
    • android.app.Activity
    • android.app.Fragment
    • androidx.fragment.app.Fragment

    public final class RiskParams<T>
extends Object
    An object that encapsulates all parameters required for risk assessment.

    Category - Risk API

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      RiskParams(T target, String name, int id)

    • Constructor Detail

      • RiskParams

        public RiskParams(@NonNull
                  T target,
                  @NonNull
                  String name,
                  int id)
        Construct a RiskParams from the required inputs.

        WARNING: If provided value of the argument is not supported by backend, backend might return error during risk assessment call.

        Parameters:
        target - The current view getting the events.
        name - The placement name to identify the flow associated with the current page.
        Supported values (so far) are:
        • "CreateAccountMobile" - for user registration page
        • "LoginMobile" - for login page
        • "TransferFundsMobile" - for transfer funds page
        • "GenericMobile" - for generic page
        id - The placement number within the current flow. For single page flow, the value should be 1. For flow that spans multiple pages, the value is the page number (1, 2, 3, etc).
